pkgmetadata.longdescription: Backup-cron is a minimalist backup generation system based on GNU tools and the use of the Cron scheduler. This package contains configuration files and utilities for clear old backups from remote hosts.

use.flag: Not install the backup_home.cron script to back up /home directory.
Not install the scripts to back up the root directory, /usr and /var.
Install only the scripts to back up the /usr directory.
Install only the scripts to back up the /var directory.
